txt.en: Gálhyrst can be found on the southern edge of the Beorning-lands.\n\nYou should defeat the Huorns and vicious hornets found at Gálhyrst.

You found a glen in the hills that is feared by Beornings as a place where trees move without wind and bees sting without warning. They call it Gálhyrst, and whisper of Clutchroot, a vile and corrupt Huorn that stalks there. The folk of the Beorning-lands will welcome the defeat of the Huorns and hornets of Gálhyrst.
You defeated the dangerous Huorn Clutchroot as well as his corrupt fellows and the vicious hornets in Gálhyrst. Those in the Beorning-lands will be pleased with your efforts.
Gálhyrst can be found on the southern edge of the Beorning-lands.\n\nYou should defeat the Huorns and vicious hornets found at Gálhyrst.
Defeated Huorns and hornets at Gálhyrst.
In the far corners of the Beorning-lands, the leaves rustle without wind and the trees move for no apparent reason.
